desc.1: Imagine a universe where the passion for VALORANT comes alive. With Sabine, you don't just manage your own team ‚Äî you dive into electrifying matches and build a true dynasty of stars. Feel the power to transform your team into a legend!
desc.3: Stay up to date with results and statistics

build.title: Build your Roster
build.desc: Build your roster is too use. Just run the command /claim to claim a random player, /promote to promote him to active roster and /roster to see your roster. If need help, join our support server!

cards.title: Giant Diversity of Cards
cards.desc: There are more than {size} different cards to use and get by using /claim or buy by using /sign. If need help, join our support server!

sign.title: Sign Players
sign.desc: Sign players using coins by using /sign and build your roster quickly and easily, without depending on the drop rate of /claim. If need help, join our support server!

admin.description: See the dashboard and change the bot language

activatekey.description: Activate your premium key on a server

language.description: Change the language that I interact with you, overriding the language set on the server

live.description: Enable and disable the live feed feature

news.description: Enable and disable the news feature

premium.description: See informations about your premium plan

promote.description: Promote a player to active roster

remove.description: Remove a player from active roster

metadata.title: Sabine | Your VALORANT simulator
metadata.desc:
Imagine a universe where the passion for VALORANT comes alive. With Sabine, you don't just manage your own team; you dive into electrifying matches and build a true dynasty of stars. Feel the power to transform your team into a legend!

üèÜ Schedule matches from various tournaments
üéØ Stay updated with results and stats
üí° Make predictions
ü•á Compete with the best players

introduction.title: Introduction to Tournament, predictions and results
introduction.description: This feature lets you track Valorant and League of Legends matches, make predictions, and view the results.

tournaments.title: Adding Tournaments
tournaments.description: To add a Valorant or League of Legends tournament, you must use /tournament add, select the game, select the matches channel and select the results channel. It is highly recommended that the matches channel be a channel where members cannot send messages and only Sabine's message flow is allowed.

predictions.title: Making Predictions
predictions.description: To make a prediction, you must to go to the matches channel and look for the Sabine's message. After that, look for the Predict button and make your prediction.

bets.title: Making Bets
bets.description: To make a bet, you must go to the matches channel and look for the Sabine's message. You must also have at least 500 coins to make a bet. After that, look for the Bet button and make your bet.

introduction.title: Introduction to Simulator
introduction.description: The simulator is a unique experience. Build your roster with players of different skill levels, duel against opponents, and prove you have what it takes to lead your team to the top. Every decision matters ‚Äî victory depends on your team level!

how_it_works.title: How it Works
how_it_works.description: Each match in the simulator is resolved based on your players' stats and a bit of luck. The stronger and more balanced your team is, the higher your chances of winning. To duel against someone, your team must have 5 players on active roster. After that, you can use /duel to duel agains someone.

players.title: Players
players.description: Every player in the simulator has a overall and unique attributes like aim, headshot, movement, aggression, ACS, and game sense. You can buy and sell players you do not want. Some players are rarer and perform better in clutch situations. Claim a random player by using /claim.

matches.title: Matches
matches.description: Matches are played in a BO1 format and whoever scores 13 points first wins. You can track your recent results and matches by using /career.

progress.title: Progression and Ranking
progress.description: Winning matches earns you points and helps your team climb the global leaderboard. The higher you go, the more recognition you gain ‚Äî and stronger players might want to join your roster. Rankings are updated regularly, and the best teams get featured.

introduction.title: Introduction to Cards
introduction.description: All players' stats are taken from the website thespike.gg.

calc.title: Attributes Calculation
calc.description: AIM: (KPR * 40) + (HS% * 1.8) HS: HS% * 2 MOV: (1.5 - DPR) * 80 AGG: (FBPR * 250) + (KPR * 15) ACS: ACS / 3 GMS: (APR * 150) + (FBSR * 0.6) After the calculation, most players get manually adjusted buffs and debuffs based on the tier they play in.

attributes.title: Attributes
attributes.description: AIM: Self-explanatory HS: Self-explanatory MOV: Movement AGG: Aggression ACS: Average Score Combat GMS: Game Sense
